chatengine

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatengine.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Christopher Madrigal

    The Server class is the front end of the server implementation of this chat service.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Broadcaster broadcaster 
      private ClientManager clientManager 
      private ServerResourceManager resources

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(int port,
              ServerHandler debugHandler)
        Creates a new Server
        Parameters:
        port - Port for the Server to listen to
        debugHandler - Responds to Debug, Exception, and System message events
        See Also:
        ServerHandler

    • Method Detail

      • sendToClients

        public void sendToClients(Message messageToSend)
        Allows host to send a message to all Clients.
        Parameters:
        messageToSend - Message to broadcast
        See Also:
        Message

      • sendToClient

        public void sendToClient(java.lang.String clientID,
                         Message messageToSend)
        Allows host to send message to specific client.
        Parameters:
        clientID - ID of client to send message to
        messageToSend - Message to send to client
        See Also:
        Message, ClientWrapper

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down server.

        Closes the client manager, broadcaster, and purges all connections, in that order.

        See Also:
        ClientManager, Broadcaster, ServerResourceManager
